search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Anedot (anedot.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Anedot is available at: [https://anedot.com/pricing](https://anedot.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

===============

Resources

[![Image 33: Action Pages Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/651ed51a7e5f6a86b70a927d_action-pages-icon.svg) #### Action Pages Gallery View some of our favorite Action Pages created by Anedot customers.](https://anedot.com/action-pages-gallery)[![Image 34: Nonprofit Pulse Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe13740149221e9317c_nonprofit-pulse-podcast-icon.svg) #### Nonprofit Pulse Explore trends, insights, and resources that help nonprofits accomplish their mission.](https://anedot.com/nonprofit-pulse)[![Image 35: Anedot Blog Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe134337010ef75a06b_anedot-blog-icon.svg) #### Anedot Blog Anedot's blog for online fundraising, donation, and marketing resources.](https://anedot.com/blog)[![Image 36: Guides and Webinars Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe100c128010ffcb62d_guides-webinar-icon.svg) #### Guides and Webinars Get access to free guides and webinars for your organization.](https://anedot.com/resources)[![Image 37: Anedot Learn Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe1bb6115e9cf1e0cef_anedot-learn-icon.svg) #### Anedot Learn Grow your organization through giving with our free resources.](https://anedot.com/learn)[![Image 38: Customer Stories Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe1457ccdbcccc96827_customer-stories-icon.svg) #### Customer Stories Read success stories from organizations that are saving time and money with Anedot.](https://anedot.com/customer-stories)

[![Image 39: Anedot TV Thumbnails](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6696e564aaa8710deaf35b22_anedot-tv-graphic-hero.jpg)Find video content on marketing tactics, online fundraising, and more! Watch Now →](https://www.youtube.com/c/anedot)

[![Image 40: Email Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567afe147e74845750baaae_subscribe-icon.svg) #### Subscribe to our newsletter!](https://www.anedot.com/blog#blogcta)

Support

Support

We're here to help!  
  
Organizations and donors can always access Anedot's friendly and helpful U.S. based Support team.

[![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/67813add72ea45ff29a724df_help-center-icon.svg) #### Customer Help Center Find answers and resources to manage your organization's account.](https://help.anedot.com/en)[![Image 42: Customer Support Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/6567a1739de24fe745f31a4d_customer-support-icon.svg) #### Customer Support Connect with our Customer Support team.](https://anedot.com/getsupport)[![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/67813acd6d12e974898b4577_donor-help-center-icon.svg) #### Donor Help Center Find resources to manage recurring donations, giving history, and more.](https://intercom.help/donorsupport/en)[![Image 44: Donor Support Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/651ed51a505c361db830d37f_donor-support-icon.svg) #### Donor Support Connect with our Donor Support team.](https://anedot.com/donorsupport)

Online giving

Everything you need to receive online giving and donations
----------------------------------------------------------

We've processed billions of dollars in online giving. That experience has guided us in building powerful online giving tools that save you time and money.

Action Pages
------------

Build high-conversion giving pages quickly with no code. Donors can give with one click from any device. Anedot increases donation conversions.

![Image 53: Beautiful donation page icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624362b726cb4661bfafef73_Beautiful_Pages_Icon_Green500.svg)

### Beautiful

Build unlimited pages for donations and lead generation.

![Image 54: Customizable donation page icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624362cb5c537c1641a0b26d_Customizable_Icon_Green500.svg)

### Customizable

Add your own brand colors, images, videos, and add-ons.

![Image 55: Optimized donation page icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624362d31842804af76bfdbb_Optimized_Icon_Green500.svg)

### Optimized

Increase conversions with recurring giving, multi-fund, and more.

![Image 56: Green quote icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623cbf959839c262fb14b09f_Testimonial_Quote_Green200.svg)

I've set up hundreds of donation pages for different clients, and using the Anedot page builder is very straight forward.

Brad T.

CEO

![Image 57: Lightning icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623ce25c7b4bc1082ae08b08_Lightning_Icon_Green500.svg)

Once approved, organizations can have a giving link in less than 5 minutes.

Finance
-------

Anedot is both processor and platform, saving you time and money. Because Anedot controls the financial stack end-to-end, you have more control over your data and deposits providing flexibility and saving time.

![Image 58: Easy access icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624363a48c77aa05f7c655e0_Easy_Access_Yellow500.svg)

### Easy Access

Access and reconcile financial data within minutes, not days.

![Image 59: Security icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624363b0dc0914fc0bfeaa90_Secure_Icon_Yellow500.svg)

### Secure Control

Customize financial outputs for your workflows.

![Image 60: Portable data icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624363bac71e5f9cb54ff1a4_Portable_Data_Icon_Yellow500.svg)

### Portable Data

Streamline reporting with third-party integrations.

![Image 61: Yellow quote icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623cd52caea48470df749652_Testimonial_Quote_Yellow200.svg)

From the bookkeeping side - the reporting capability is fantastic. The best user friendly and bookkeeper friendly software around!

Jinger K.

Campaign Manager/Bookkeeper

![Image 62: Data icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623cd6f3abbcc2ea93f3aa3c_Data_Icon_Yellow500.svg)

Start saving time. **Pull reports in minutes**, not days.

Industries

Who we serve
------------

We proudly serve thousands of nonprofits, churches, campaigns, and schools. These organizations take our powerful online giving solutions and make a positive difference in the world.

![Image 63: Organization icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/62426398534040ddfcffe2ce_Organization_Icon_Blue600.svg)

30,000+ Orgs

![Image 64: Clock icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624263a0cd3b4230293519a4_Clock_Icon_Blue600.svg)

14+ Years

![Image 65: Money icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/624263a67ea88325e4c6223a_Money_Icon_Blue600.svg)

Billions Processed

![Image 66: Organization icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/62426398534040ddfcffe2ce_Organization_Icon_Blue600.svg)

Save time and money, and increase donor engagement with our nonprofit fundraising software.

Grow your base and connect with your supporters. Build surveys, polls, and signup forms without using any code.

Data security is our priority. Your data is always protected using industry-leading security measures.

Online giving for churches and ministries
-----------------------------------------

Online giving is essential for any church, no matter the size or age of the congregation. Anedot helps churches keep more gifts with our 3% church rate.

![Image 80: Donor Covers Fees Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/651ed51a4146dea778f3e57c_donor-covers-fees-icon.svg)

### Private Access

We never share, sell, or trade your donor’s data, or their tracking information. Your data is yours.

![Image 97: Colleges, universities, and schools icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623cf39a4b03c90e19c29dff_Education_Anedot_Icon_Blue600.svg)

Colleges, Universities, and Schools
-----------------------------------

Take development to the next level
----------------------------------

Receive donations online and grow your school. Quickly launch multiple school fundraising and university fundraising campaigns that gather leads and donations.

[Learn More](https://anedot.com/education)

![Image 98: Multi funds icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623dce00d6275e506ebdd690_Multiple_Funds_Blue600.svg)

### Multiple Funds

Let your supporters donate to the project of their choice. You can include multiple funds on one donation page.

![Image 99: Action Pages icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623dca05e8ca176e38fde765_Action_Pages_Anedot_Icon_Blue600.svg)

### Lead Generation

Get more fundraising prospects with Action Pages. You easily can create beautiful, responsive pages.

![Image 100: QR codes icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623dcff13a2303d544407e0c_QR_Codes_Icon_Blue600.svg)

### QR Codes

Donors can make instant donations with QR codes. Every Anedot customer gets these features completely free.

![Image 101](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/623e14ef8c27d74bbe38c2bd_Bottom_Curve_Yellow100.svg)

Integrations

Power up and connect your tools
-------------------------------

Add Anedot data to your existing workflows with third-party integrations.

![Image 112](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/623c91abc34d6c1d4453d52a/65205a2b1659e3772d24050e_Top_Curve_Blue200.svg)

Pricing

No monthly fees, no contracts, your success is our success
----------------------------------------------------------

Our pricing structure is simple. We only charge a small processing cost on donations.

✓

No hidden fees

✓

No monthly fees

✓

Free text to give

✓

Quick and easy setup

✓

Fast and friendly support team

Enterprise? [Send us a message!](mailto:success@anedot.com?subject=Pricing%20Inquiry%20For%20Large%20Organization)

$0/month
--------

501(c)(3)

Credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal: 3.0%-3.3% + 30¢

Bitcoin: 1.0%

ACH/bank draft: 0.3% + 30¢

Standard

Credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal, ACH/bank draft: 4.0% + 30¢

Bitcoin: 1.0%

[Start Now](https://anedot.com/signup)
